shortDescription: plone.app.users in Plone 4.0 and 4.1 allows remote authenticated users to modify the properties of arbitrary accounts via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild in June 2011.
vulnerabilityName: plone.app.users in Plone 4.0 and 4.1 Remote Authenticated Account Manipulation
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
